sqlMap.select: select MENU_ID as menuId, NODE_ID as nodeId, NODE_NAME as nodeName, NODE_URL as nodeUrl, PARENT_NODE as parentNode, SEQ_ID as seqId, NODE_IMG as nodeImg, RELA_FLAG as relaFlag, NODE_TARGET as nodeTarget, NODE_CMD as nodeCmd, NODE_VISIBLE as nodeVisible, NODE_TOOLTIP as nodeTooltip, HAS_CHILD_FLAG as hasChildFlag from sys_menu where MENU_ID=#value# AND NODE_VISIBLE='1' order by PARENT_NODE,SEQ_ID
